document_data.name: Arlavaunta
document_data.mainbody: '''Arlavaunta''' was a [[green dragon]] in the [[Wizard's Reach]] during the midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The dragon Arlavaunta attacked the company of knights with which King [[Baerimgrim]] was riding in the year {{yearlinkName|763}}, when he set out to demand a renewed vow and back taxes from his baron [[Tholone]]. The dragon was ultimately slain by his court mage, [[Ilgrist]].
document_data.Rumors: It was said that Arlavaunta attacked King Baerimgrim on Baron Tholone's orders.
